verses.verse: To every thing there is a season <WH2165>, and a time <WH6256> to every purpose <WH2656> under the heaven <WH8064>:
A time <WH6256> to be born <WH3205>, and a time <WH6256> to die <WH4191>; a time <WH6256> to plant <WH5193>, and a time <WH6256> to pluck up <WH6131> that which is planted <WH5193>;
A time <WH6256> to kill <WH2026>, and a time <WH6256> to heal <WH7495>; a time <WH6256> to break down <WH6555>, and a time <WH6256> to build up <WH1129>;
A time <WH6256> to weep <WH1058>, and a time <WH6256> to laugh <WH7832>; a time <WH6256> to mourn <WH5594>, and a time <WH6256> to dance <WH7540>;

A time <WH6256> to cast away <WH7993> stones <WH68>, and a time <WH6256> to gather <WH3664> stones <WH68> together <WH3664>; a time <WH6256> to embrace <WH2263>, and a time <WH6256> to refrain <WH7368> from embracing <WH2263>;
A time <WH6256> to get <WH1245>, and a time <WH6256> to lose <WH6>; a time <WH6256> to keep <WH8104>, and a time <WH6256> to cast away <WH7993>;
A time <WH6256> to tear <WH7167>, and a time <WH6256> to sew <WH8609>; a time <WH6256> to keep silence <WH2814>, and a time <WH6256> to speak <WH1696>;
A time <WH6256> to love <WH157>, and a time <WH6256> to hate <WH8130>; a time <WH6256> of war <WH4421>, and a time <WH6256> of peace <WH7965>.
What profit <WH3504> has he that works <WH6213> in that where <WH834> he labors <WH6001>?
I have seen <WH7200> the hardship <WH6045>, which God <WH430> has given <WH5414> to the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> to be exercised in it <WH6031>.

He has made <WH6213> every thing beautiful <WH3303> in his time <WH6256>: also he has set <WH5414> the world <WH5769> in their heart <WH3820>, so that <WH1097> no man <WH120> can find out <WH4672> the work <WH4639> that God <WH430> makes <WH6213> from the beginning <WH7218> to the end <WH5490>.
I know <WH3045> that there is no good <WH2896> in them <WH8055>, but for a man to rejoice, and to do <WH6213> good <WH2896> in his life <WH2416>.
And also that every man <WH120> should eat <WH398> and drink <WH8354>, and enjoy <WH7200> the good <WH2896> of all his labor <WH5999>, it is the gift <WH4991> of God <WH430>.

I know <WH3045> that <WH430>, whatever God does <WH6213>, it shall be for ever <WH5769>: nothing <WH369> can be put <WH3254> to it <WH1639>, nor any thing taken from it <WH430>: and God does <WH6213> it <WH3372>, that men should fear before him <WH6440>.
That which has been is now <WH3528>; and that which is to be has already <WH3528> been <WH430>; and God requires <WH1245> that which is past <WH7291>.

And moreover I saw <WH7200> under the sun <WH8121> the place <WH4725> of judgment <WH4941>, that wickedness <WH7562> was there <WH4725>; and the place of righteousness <WH6664>, that iniquity was there <WH7562>.

I said <WH559> in my heart <WH3820>, God <WH430> shall judge <WH8199> the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>: for there is a time <WH6256> there for every purpose <WH2656> and for every work <WH4639>.

I said <WH559> in my heart <WH3820> concerning the estate <WH1700> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>, that God <WH430> might manifest <WH1305> them <WH7200>, and that they might see that they <WH1992> themselves are animals <WH929>.

For that which befalls <WH4745> the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> befalls <WH4745> animals <WH929>; even one thing <WH259> befalls <WH4745> them <WH4194>: as the one dies, so dies <WH4194> the other <WH2088>; Yes <WH259>, they have all one breath <WH7307>; so that a man <WH120> has no preeminence <WH4195> above a animal <WH929>: for all is vanity <WH1892>.
All go <WH1980> unto one <WH259> place <WH4725>; all are of the dust <WH6083>, and all turn <WH7725> to dust <WH6083> again <WH7725>.
Who knows <WH3045> the spirit <WH7307> of man <WH1121> that goes <WH5927> upward <WH4605>, and the spirit <WH7307> of the animal <WH929> that goes <WH3381> downward <WH4295> to the earth <WH776>?

Therefore I perceive <WH7200> that there is nothing better <WH2896>, than that a man <WH120> should rejoice <WH8055> in his own works <WH4639>; for that is his portion <WH2506>: for who shall bring <WH935> him to see <WH7200> what shall be after him <WH310>?
